response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $15,000 to us, reflecting its quality, functionality, and exclusivity. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business, offering unparalleled benefits and opportunities. Considering its worth and potential impact, we kindly propose an offer of $18,000 for this remarkable product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 18000}
